```{r}
##Bonus for loop
#based ont he island the penquin are on, fill in a column that tells us whos favorite it is 
#Tejiri = dream
#Sawyer = Biscoe
#Rachel = Torgersen
data("penguins")
penguins$island
penguins$StudentFavorite <- NA
for(i in 1:nrow(penguins)){
  if(penguins$island[i]=="Dream"){
    penguins$StudentFavorite[i]<-"Tejiri"
  }
  if(penguins$island[i]=="Biscoe"){
    penguins$StudentFavorite[i]<-"Sawyer"
  }
  if(penguins$island[i]=="Torgersen"){
    penguins$StudentFavorite[i]<-"Rachel"}
  }

```
